title: Bug? I cant click on see more stats anymore
body: I haven't been able to click on see more stats button on the leagues tab. Is this a bug or intentional?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is a known issue and is currently being worked on, this has been a problem since the release of new champ select.

Please see [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) thread for more information about known bugs with NCS.
